# T-test

```{r}
type_1_fejl_t <- replicate(1000, {
  Stik1 <- rbeta(n, alpha, beta)
  Stik2 <- rbeta(n, alpha, beta)
  test <- t.test(Stik1, Stik2, alternative = "two.sided", mu = 0, conf.level = 0.95)
  andel <- test$p.value > 0.05
})

table(type_1_fejl_t)
```
